Scroll down to see a more detailed demonstration of the encryption process.

Encryption

-----1-----

Enter a message

Message is padded with random characters

IaGWxbtCpQwUIgyxBhWfFUerSJXwQQuTtJHfsbJv|Here is a demo message|

Message text to hex

496147577862744370517755496779784268576646556572534a587751517554744a486673624a767c4865726520697320612064656d6f206d6573736167657c

Message Hex to decimal

3843222174544847893467223091407451758882769854241809191125655886645800567640772719044396783796470304153789486761933803492522729752274294666727705316648316

XOR the message decimal against the key decimal to produce a cipher decimal

------> ⊕ <------< p="">

-----2-----

Enter a key

Sha256 hash (already in hex)

cc22256064ada159fc509dc8f1bbb562ee74663d6ea649ab2a260d36bd0a73903e2f58674448bd187b82f4da5f44a1028e0e303d04cb64c98143c0944d5dc5db

Key Hex to decimal

10691332769332619538623497094861176388333738065573175236600211676436943213364097704237459569202872653624137916862798807285029722208226473510038160128460251

Cipher decimal

6979561027248696747755045026230347442564756467967460970441311405314596550678773197070978689254359330543516392382508303976633506260669976618663169184407719

-----3-----

Cipher Decimal to Hex (This is what gets sent to the server)

854362371ccfd51a8c01ea9db8dccc1aac1c315b28f32cd9796c5541ec5b06c44a651001372af76e07ca91a83a64c871ae6f105961a60be9ec26b3e72c3aa0a7

  1. The message you enter is padded with random letters and converted into a decimal.
  2. Key text is hashed with sha256 and converted into a decimal.
  3. The decimal cipher is produced by XORing the decimal message against the decimal key.

Decryption

-----4-----

Cipher Input

(copy and paste from Cipher Decimal to Hex above)

Cipher Hex to decimal

6979561027248696747755045026230347442564756467967460970441311405314596550678773197070978689254359330543516392382508303976633506260669976618663169184407719

XOR the decimal message against the decimal key to produce a decimal cipher

------> ⊕ <------< p="">

-----5-----

Key input

Sha256 hash (already in hex)

cc22256064ada159fc509dc8f1bbb562ee74663d6ea649ab2a260d36bd0a73903e2f58674448bd187b82f4da5f44a1028e0e303d04cb64c98143c0944d5dc5db

Key Hex to decimal

10691332769332619538623497094861176388333738065573175236600211676436943213364097704237459569202872653624137916862798807285029722208226473510038160128460251

XOR result of Cipher Decimal and Key Decimal

3843222174544847893467223091407451758882769854241809191125655886645800567640772719044396783796470304153789486761933803492522729752274294666727705316648316

Decypted Decimal to Hex (This is what gets sent to the server)

496147577862744370517755496779784268576646556572534a587751517554744a486673624a767c4865726520697320612064656d6f206d6573736167657c

Decrypted Hex to Text

IaGWxbtCpQwUIgyxBhWfFUerSJXwQQuTtJHfsbJv|Here is a demo message|

-----6-----

Decrypted message with padding removed

Here is a demo message

  1. Copy and paste the hex cipher to turn it into a decimal.
  2. Key text is hashed with sha256 and converted into a decimal.
  3. The decimal of the message is XORed against the decimal of the key. This produces the cipher hex.
Happy encrypting
